results.title: Modulation by metformin of molecular and histopathological alterations in the lung of cigarette smoke-exposed mice
results.text_hl: In smoke-exposed @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ considerably decreased @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ adduct levels and oxidative @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ damage, and normalized the expression of several microRNAs.

citations.NLM: Izzotti A, Balansky R, D'Agostini F, Longobardi M, Cartiglia C, Micale RT, La Maestra S, Camoirano A, Ganchev G, Iltcheva M, Steele VE, De Flora S. results.title: Does metformin prevent short-term oxidant-induced dna damage? In vitro study on lymphocytes from aged subjects.
results.text_hl: The ability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to modulate @<m>DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA damage@@@ produced by oxidative stress is not known.

results.title: The beneficial effects of AMP kinase activation against oxidative stress are associated with prevention of PPARalpha-cyclophilin D interaction in cardiomyocytes.
